sentences.en: a harbour on the leeward side of the island
sentences.cn: 位于岛的背风面的海港

sentences.en: A leeward tide is dangerous for small boats.
sentences.cn: 顺风潮对小船来说是危险的.

sentences.en: Able to sail close to wind with little drift to leeward.
sentences.cn: 帆船上用于防止向下风向漂流的鳍板.

sentences.en: But at least in the prestige and morality and justice, fell leeward.
sentences.cn: 但至少在声誉和道义上, 落了下风.

sentences.en: Frontal slope is increased in the upward side , but decreased in the leeward side.
sentences.cn: 当冷锋位于迎风坡时, 其坡度减小,位于背风坡时,其坡度增大.

sentences.en: In sailing, one basic rule is that the leeward boat has the right - of - way over windward boat.
sentences.cn: 帆船比赛的一项基本规则是,顺风船应避让逆风船.

sentences.en: Leeward : The side farthest from the wind.
sentences.cn: 下风侧: 距离风向最远的一侧.

sentences.en: The ship sagged ( away ) to leeward.
The trees all listed to leeward.
sentences.cn: 树木统统向下风方向倾.

sentences.en: There are multiple vertical upwarding zones in the warm side when thein the leeward side.
sentences.cn: 当冷锋位于背风坡时,在暖区沿锋面上升的暖空气运动范围增大,可以出现沿锋面相间隔的多个上升区.

sentences.en: We camped on the leeward side of the mountain.
sentences.cn: 我们在山上背风的一面扎营。

sentences.en: We steered a course to leeward.
When the wind dropped, the boat sagged away to leeward.
sentences.cn: 风停后, 这条小船向下风飘去.

phrases.tran_cn: 背风群岛（西印度群岛中小安的列斯群岛北部的群岛）

trans.tran_cn: 在背风面的；背风的；下风的
trans.tran_en: the leeward side of something is the side that is sheltered from the wind
